content: {"name": "Trinity United Methodist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "This ministry has a group of families who have come to count on us to get them thru hard times and are so appreciative of the help.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6230 Beatties Ford Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Beatties Ford / Trinity", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28216", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.3197879, "longitude": -80.8633349}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 399-1684", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "22:00", "closes_at": "23:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}]}
